Bonesaw McGraw

Streamy Goodness

When I Stream

I steam every Tuesday night (7:30p EDT to until about Midnight). I may stream beyond Tuesdays more consistently, but nothing is set in stone. The best way to know when I'm online is to give me a follow!

First and foremost, I'm all about Jackbox Games. It's the only thing I do on Tuesdays. Beyond those, you can find a list of the games I commonly stream on the last slide. I prefer party games and playing with my viewers, so it's what I do most!

Who is Bonesaw?

Hi I'm Bonesaw! everything you need to know about me can be summed up in these two videos:

Rules & Regulations

The golden rule here is "don't be a knob." Beyond that, we have a lot of time for crude humor, swears, and other immature fun that comes with playing Jackbox games.

We have no time for negativity, racism, sexism, homophobia, xenophobia, or other lovely things of that nature. Take those elsewhere. We'd rather stream with no one watching (or not stream at all) than babysit immature participants.

If you have questions about what's cool (or what's not), don't hesitate to ask!
